scripts.build-gh: TIDDLYWIKI_PLUGIN_PATH=plugins node ./node_modules/tiddlywiki/tiddlywiki.js editions/all-plugins --build index && cp -R editions/all-plugins/files editions/all-plugins/output/
scripts.dev: cross-env TIDDLYWIKI_PLUGIN_PATH=plugins npx nodemon -e tid,multids,js,info,css,json,meta --watch plugins ./node_modules/tiddlywiki/tiddlywiki.js editions/dev --listen port=7555
scripts.local: cross-env TIDDLYWIKI_PLUGIN_PATH=plugins npx nodemon -e tid,multids,js,info,css,json,meta --watch plugins ./node_modules/tiddlywiki/tiddlywiki.js editions/all-plugins --listen host=192.168.1.115 port=8080
scripts.swiffy:update-lib: npm install --save-dev swiffy-slider && cp node_modules/swiffy-slider/dist/js/swiffy-slider.esm.js plugins/sq/SwiffySlider/lib/ && cp node_modules/swiffy-slider/dist/js/swiffy-slider-extensions.js plugins/sq/SwiffySlider/lib/ && cp node_modules/swiffy-slider/dist/css/swiffy-slider.css plugins/sq/SwiffySlider
